synopsis.text: The "Detective Conan" TV special provides backstory and additional context for the 25th Detective Conan film, "The Bride of Halloween", focusing specifically on the relationship between detectives Miwako Sato and Wataru Takagi. Sato is struggling to move on from the death of her former partner and lover Jinpei Matsuda, who perished in a bomb explosion. Though Takagi cares deeply for Sato, she remains tied to her traumatic past. When a bomb detonates in Touto Tower, Sato's history seems to resurface. Ultimately, she resolves not to let the past hold her back anymore and to embrace her feelings for Takagi. The special contains footage and storylines from past Detective Conan episodes showing Sato and Takagi working together as partners. We see glimpses into their adventures and growing affection over time. The additional backstory and character development lead directly into the events of the film, showing Sato preparing for her wedding to Takagi. Overall, the special provides meaningful context about the two characters' journey while teasing the culmination of their romantic relationship in "The Bride of Halloween." Viewers witness the couple navigating Sato's emotional baggage before finally coming together.
